description: This file is an include (.inc) file used in the Yocto Project build system, containing functions and variables for packaging GStreamer plugins into separate packages. It automates the generation of sub-packages for each plugin and manages meta-packages that depend on all plugin packages.

methods.name: split_gstreamer10_packages
methods.description: Dynamically splits GStreamer plugin library files into individual packages and sets up dependencies accordingly.

methods.name: set_metapkg_rdepends
methods.description: Sets up the RDEPENDS for the meta-package, determining which packages are included based on their contents and existence.
